products.name: House Blend Coffee
products.description: Our signature blend with notes of chocolate and caramel. A medium roast that's perfect for any time of day. This balanced coffee is sourced from farms in Colombia and Brazil.

products.name: Ethiopian Single Origin
products.description: Light roasted with bright, fruity notes. This exceptional coffee from the highlands of Ethiopia offers vibrant acidity with floral, berry, and citrus notes. Perfect for pour-over brewing.

products.name: Espresso Blend
products.description: Dark roasted for perfect espresso extraction. Our espresso blend combines beans from Indonesia and Central America for a rich, complex shot with notes of dark chocolate and caramel.

products.name: Cold Brew Kit
products.description: Everything you need to make smooth cold brew at home. Kit includes a 1-liter glass brewer, reusable filter, and 8oz of our special cold brew blend. Makes approximately 4 servings.

products.name: Pour Over Coffee Maker
products.description: Classic glass pour over with wooden collar. This elegant brewer allows for precise control over brewing variables for a perfect cup every time. Includes 15 paper filters to get you started.

products.name: Colombian Decaf
products.description: Full-bodied decaf with notes of caramel and nuts. This water-processed decaf gives you all the flavor without the caffeine. Perfect for evening enjoyment.

products.name: French Press
products.description: Classic stainless steel French press. Makes up to 32oz of rich, full-bodied coffee. The double-wall construction keeps your coffee hot longer.

products.name: Sumatra Dark Roast
products.description: A bold, earthy coffee with low acidity and notes of dark chocolate and spice. This single-origin from Sumatra has a distinctive flavor profile that's perfect for dark roast lovers.
